definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: If the bus is late, you can claim a full fund.
sentences.chinese: 如果車輛晚點，你可以全額退票。

sentences.english: They are chafing at the continuing delays of the buses.
sentences.chinese: 他們因公共汽車連續晚點而不耐煩。

sentences.english: We got loaded onto a bus after a modest delay.
sentences.chinese: 謙遜的晚點過後，我們上了一輛公共汽車。

sentences.english: As often as not the buses are late on foggy days.
sentences.chinese: 遇多霧天氣時，公共汽車經常晚點。

sentences.english: Danielle: I might have to get back to you.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮爾:我要晚點才能答覆你。

sentences.english: My flight arrived very late because there was a hold-up at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 我航班到達的時候非常晚，因爲在機場晚點了。

sentences.english: The mini-bus is late because of the traffic jams during the rush hour.
sentences.chinese: 下班高峯時段，小公共因爲交通堵塞晚點了。

sentences.english: Save your TV show to your digital set-top box for later viewing instead.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把電視節目存在機頂盒裏，晚點再看。

sentences.english: The arrival of the train was delayed.
Please give my mother a message to say that we shall be late.
sentences.chinese: 請給我媽媽帶個信兒，告訴她我們晚點到。

sentences.english: Japan Air Lines Flight No.32 has been delayed three hours.
sentences.chinese: 日本航空公司三十二班次的飛機已經晚點三小時。

sentences.english: It's better for you to go by boat than by train.
sentences.chinese: 火車晚點了，我們沒有趕上那班船。

sentences.english: It's not safe to gamble on the train arriving late.
sentences.chinese: 指望這次列車晚點，是很不保準的。

sentences.english: And don't ask me that again after I just try to ride the subway later today.
sentences.chinese: 我只想今天晚點去坐地鐵，別再問我這個問題了。

sentences.english: I''m really busy. Can I call you back later?
sentences.chinese: 我現在真的很忙，我晚點給你打過去，行嗎？

sentences.english: When I arrived, my plane was late.
sentences.chinese: 當我到達的時候，飛機晚點了。

definition: to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
to finish class/to get out of class
to keep up with/to catch up with/to overtake/to chance upon/in time for
to take the car, bus, train etc
